org.sd.util.tree
Class TreeAnalyzer<T>

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.util.tree.TreeAnalyzer<T>

public class TreeAnalyzer<T>
extends java.lang.Object

A helper class to analyze a tree and cache the results.

Note that an analyzer's results are invalidated by structural changes to the tree.

Author:
Spence Koehler

Constructor Detail

TreeAnalyzer

public TreeAnalyzer(Tree<T> tree,
                    KeyFunction<T> keyFunction)
Construct a tree analyzer for the given tree and using the given match function (okay if null).

Parameters:
tree - The tree to be analyzed.
keyFunction - A key function for creating a key from node data for matching data across nodes. If null, a default key function will be generated based on data.toString().
